name: koconut
description: Promise-Friendly Kotlin style collection lib for nodejs.

scripts.update: ncu -u && npm install && echo Update Completed
scripts.build: ts-node ./dev/ClearTask.ts && babel ./lib --out-dir dist --extensions .ts,.tsx && tsc && echo Build Completed
scripts.test: echo Preparing Unit Test... && mocha -r ts-node/register ./test/unitTest/*.spec.ts && echo Unit Test Completed
scripts.testSequence: echo Preparing Unit Test... && mocha -r ts-node/register ./test/unitTest/*Sequence.spec.ts && echo Unit Test Completed
scripts.validate: npm run test && ts-node ./dev/DepreactedMethodValidatingTask.ts -f && echo Validating deprecation method completed.
scripts.distribute: npm run update && npm run build && npm run doc && npm run topic && npm test && ts-node ./dev/DistributingTask.ts
